entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Incorrect "Expression is always false" with `long.operator %` #59680
  • IOperation support for list patterns #57194
    17.2
  • Test plan for lambda improvements #52192
    17.2
  • switch expression returns double on int, long, float condition #59651
    17.2
  • Backslach in interpolated raw string literal #59670
  • Improve error messages for Json StringSyntaxAttribute #59641
  • StringSyntax doesn't recognize {params} arrays, collection initializers, etc. #59645

Updated

  • MacOS Failure to Restore with signature validation issue #58202
    17.1
  • InitializeToolset flakiness in correctness builds #58199
    17.1
  • NuGet.Protocol.Core.Types.FatalProtocolException exception in helix work items #58197
    17.1
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CommandLine.UnitTests.CommandLineTests.ArgumentParsing is flaky #58077
  • Failure in CSharpCodeActions.GFUFuzzyMatchAfterRenameTrackingAndAfterGenerateType #57423
  • CI build fails due to Azure package feed error 503 (Service Unavailable) #57565
  • FixAllOccurrencesIgnoresGeneratedCode is flaky #56625
    17.2
  • Timeout on Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices.CSharp.UnitTests.dll tests #55638
  • CompletingWithColonInMethodParametersWithNoInstanceToInsert is flaky #49400
    Backlog
  • Roslyn failing to clean up listeners #48816
    Backlog
  • Assertion failure in CustomAttributesBag`1.get_IsEarlyDecodedWellKnownAttributeDataComputed #49026
  • Flaky test 'InteractiveHostDesktopTests.StackOverflow' #46414
    Backlog
  • InteractiveHostCoreTests.Stackoverflow #53392
  • Attempt to load System.Runtime reference assembly for execution causes test failure #53391
    17.2
  • Roslyn Produces Abnormally High CPU Utilization When Many Files Are Open #57525
    17.2
  • EditorConfig UI enhancements #53171
    17.2
  • Intellisense Return Value Documentation #31618
    Backlog
  • Refactor: move static method to other class #33928
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Global indentation options #59679
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Improve json error message in particular case #59650
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not try to check for escapes in an interpolated raw string literal #59676
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Lightup embedded languages inside collections marked with StringSyntax #59648
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59678
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Improve PDB source document project handling #59643
    Area-IDE
  • Global ide analyzer options #59657
    Area-IDE
  • Add feature to fixup code when user transposes 'record' in a declaration #59652
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixed odd naming suggestions #59674
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix 'unnecessary assigment' false posititive for out argument (#58564) #59625
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Show constant value of binary operators in QuickInfo #30482
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Feature Request, Community
  • [DRAFT] Do not retry on Clipboard API for StackTraceExplorer #59658
    Area-IDE
  • add all analyzers that are configured via editorconfig to code cleanup #59106
    Area-IDE
